Actions.use_case: Returns the properties of a private DNS zone or lists private DNS zones.
For creating or updating a private DNS zone.
For reading the DNS record of the AKS API server from the private DNS zone.
For adding the DNS record of the AKS API server to the private DNS zone.
For deleting the DNS record of the AKS API server from the private DNS zone, when the cluster is being torn down.
Returns the properties of a virtual network link or lists virtual network links.
